Metadata.Summary:
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
     SUMMARY FOR STORY "Firebrand" by SavantGuarde:
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
 > Word count is 200,076.
 > There are 6 acts, 57 chapters, and 114 scenes.
 > This manuscript averages:
   - 1755 words per scene.
   - 3510 words per chapter.
   - 2.0 scenes per chapter.
 > Out of 114 planned scenes, 114 are written.
 > So the Zero Draft is approximately 100.0% complete.

ChapterList.Blurb: Titus confronts another inevitable end.
36|Reward/The Mask
Titus and his friend Romin explore the outer wastes of Blackwater.
The two friends approach the fated location on Titus' map.
An unfathomable scene quickly overrides the premise of their trip.
Titus presents the results of his expedition at his father's rummage store.
Titus tends to his lonely younger sister.
Titus finds an uncomfortable breadth of stillness, but still prefers the cold.
There are always consequences for improper uses of Essence.
Romin, Valentina, and Sylvia join Titus in one last celebration.
All it takes is one little spark to set the last capital on fire.
The fractured Berguard family faces an unspeakable fate.
Titus ascends the foothills of the Afterlife.
The party discovers a sinister Chymaeran agent.
The fractured group reaches the first inner wall.
The party can only watch as Romin's ego expends lives.
Titus reaches the end of his journey.
Titus encounters Ullrich for a second time.
Tomorrow marks the advent of a golden age!'
May their souls find rest in the Reservoir.
The thread says that none of this was ever a dream.
Titus makes an abrasive, tentative ally.
Titus resists inevitability.
Titus' friends arrive for answers to his strange behavior.
Titus lives a near eternity in a single moment.
It was the only way we could survive.
Titus sees his father in a different light.
Snowdrifters drift by steel this time.
The survivors realize the ultimate purpose of the unexceptional graduates.
The furthest snowdrifitng expedition.
There is a stronghold far beyond the limits.
They worship themselves in unpaid glory.
The First Red refuse the premise of their purpose.
Titus deploys for service with the underachieving classes.
Titus finds himself deep within the Undercroft.
Titus contemplates the value of his humanity. A stranger solicits him.
Titus decides a piece of himself is no longer useful.
Titus reaches an unexpected end.
A vicious enemy unmasks themselves.
Titus is forced to receive compassion.
Titus recalls the horrors of what his anger set in motion.
A powerful ally centers Titus in one final effort.
Titus recognizes the strength in his beloved friends.
Titus digs deep and confronts one of his fears.
Titus and his plurality of friends explore the outer wastes of Blackwater.
Something is different this time. Can you feel it?
They ambush the ambush on future intelligence.
The catgirl crashes back into her neglectul family"s life.
How in Khiras" name did they get together?
Titus wishes his story could have ended here, but there is still so much more that needs to be done.
The Carmine-Merlot master plan is set in motion.
What would happen if the Vermillions made it there?
One of the Vermillion girls tries driving.
The Lower City converges on the Afterlife.
Titus takes ownership for a world he was only reborn into.
There is no salvation from failure this time. Titus and his adversary fight through the fabric of time itself.
